description: Stops a CloudWatch Logs Insights query that is in progress. If the query has already ended, the operation returns an error indicating that the specified query is not running.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The ID number of the query to stop. To find this ID number, use DescribeQueries.

nested_items.name: success
nested_items.description: This is true if the query was stopped by the StopQuery operation.
